title: Taken by the Ice Drake
description: This book is out for no cost to Marie Mackay's newsletter list. (Go to authors profile page and follow website link to claim a copy)Marry a prince. Escape her cruel family. It’s her last hope.The morning of the wedding Princess Serenity dons her white gown, anxious and excited—until she hears the news.The prince…Dead…Killed on the road just an hour’s march away…She rides to face her betrothed’s killer—a rogue drake shifter—but instead of claiming revenge, Serenity finds herself bound by the very chains meant for him…This enemies to lover’s drake shifter romance meets all your needs. Magic, humour, spice. Check. Check. Check.
author: Marie Mackay
